Ginga Tetsudou Monogatari: Wasurerareta:
This is the OVA of The Galaxy Railways.

The Galaxy Express 999 crashes on the off-limits planet of Herise and it's up to the SDF Sirius Platoon to assist. 

(Source: Wikipedia)
